      Receives point coordinates sent from the PC
      Point GameLogic.stepsToNextEmpty()
      Steps (x,y) from the current position of the robot to the next point that was empty before the last player move

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Updates the robot location
      int PieceXYReadMove.moveSensor(Point steps)
      Moves the sensor (x- and y-position) for the specified amount of x- and y-steps (one step means going to the next game piece).
      void Communication.sendDropPoint(Point point)
      Sends game piece point (player move) to the PC
      void GameLogic.setCalculatedMove(Point point)
      Saving the calculated next robot move (from PC), also saving the move to the game board grid.

      Sets the current location of the robot
      void GameLogic.setPlayerMove(Point playerMove)
      Saves the last player move after reading the value
